programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Master traditional Mexican tacos with Chef Luis Valenzuela who shares his secret to smoky and juicy pollo (chicken) tacos.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Juan Pablo Gonzalez gives us a taste of Venezuelan home cooking with traditional recipes from a comforting, hearty squash soup to a sweet passion fruit custard.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Spanish host Luis "Tigretón" Leon shares his take on four traditional dishes from the Basque region.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Bring the heat to your kitchen with Chef Luis Valenzuela as he shows us the diversity of chilies in four different recipes.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Easy Weeknight Recipes for Busy Days
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks her way from Monday to Friday with four delicious dishes, including a Roast Beef feast and velvety Earl Grey Pudding.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Fast and Flavourful Dinners for Monday to Thursday
programme.desc: Home cook Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses her multi-cooker to whip up four comforting weeknight meals that are fast and easy.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Weeknight Dishes made in Little Thyme
programme.desc: Who has "thyme" to make dinner after a hectic day? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco inspires with four recipes including a Mushroom Thyme Risotto.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Sweet, Salty, and Surprising Multi-Cooker Recipes
programme.desc: Using a multi-cooker, charming host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up a four dishes that are salty, sweet, and surprising.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 France, Japan, Morocco, Mexico
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by France - French Fennel Soup, Japan - Unagi-Style Soy Glazed Figs, Morocco - Moroccan Butterbean Tagine, and Mexico - Asparagus Ceviche!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Vietnam, Lebanon, China, Germany
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Italy, Morocco, Ethiopia, Jamaica
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Italy - Roasted Radishes and Radish Pesto, Morocco - Moroccan Spiced Apples, Ethiopia - Ethiopian Spinach Dip, and Jamaica - Jerk Shiitakes with Coconut Rice!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Endearing host Tyrone Edwards surprises South African-born Shameen Miller with the results of her DNA test. Shameen cooks a meal that combines her two cultures and shares it with her family.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards shocks Andrea Titus with her DNA results. Blending her two cultures onto one plate, Andrea then cooks up a delicious and revealing meal for her family.

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke juicy duck breasts, whip up a Caesar salad, and share the secrets of pizza on the grill!

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, smoke tilapia, whip up veggie quesadillas, and grill a chicken sandwich like you’ve never seen before!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Adopted Tara Broadbent is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her biological ancestry through food.

programme.title: Cheeseburgers of the World
programme.desc: Chef Joe Friday cooks up a New Jersey Slider from the USA, Bofsandwich from Denmark, and Pljeskavica from the Balkans.

programme.title: Corktales
programme.desc: Pull up a stool and join master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she shows us how to prepare a Collins, negroni, sazerac, and more on Corktales!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Kelly Harvey-Mycula is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her ancestry with the help of host Tyrone Edwards.

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Start Here by Sohla El-Waylly! Follow along as Shahir makes a punch-you-in-the-face sauce, beautiful seared scallops, an indulgent chocolate pudding pie for grown-ups, and much more!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen adds more plants to her plate with two epic grilled cheese recipes that sneak in veggies.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Food nerd Desiree Nielsen knows how to add more veggies to our morning and shows us how it's done with a blueberry, celery, cucumber, and red cabbage juice.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; you'll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple, fun, and magically tasty, some of Vietnam's most delicious and well-known foods come from its capital city of Hanoi. Vietnamese expert Lisa Nguyen shares her knowledge of Hanoi dishes by starting off with a sweet, sour, and spicy papaya salad called Goi Du Du. With a popular nuoc cham dressing featuring sugar, lime juice and Thai chili drizzled over a medley of crunchy carrots, fresh cilantro and mint, chewy papaya, and shrimp, this dish is the perfect balance of wonderful flavours and textures. Also on the menu, grilled-to-perfection Pork Patties with a rich caramel sauce. Fresh fragrant dill and golden turmeric elevate Lisa's next dish as she cooks up some mahi-mahi to enjoy...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Nuts about Walnuts, Pine Nuts and Pistachios
programme.desc: Nuts are a staple in Lebanon - they add depth of flavour and make dishes more hearty. Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us a unique Lebanese dish that is traditionally made in the dead of winter - Winter Tabbouleh. With no fresh herbs or vegetables, this crunchy nut, feta, and tasty bulgur salad will get you through a long winter night. Next, she makes a simmering beef tortellini with toasted pine nuts in a hot, tangy yoghurt sauce. She then cooks up tender Celebration Lamb showered in three kinds of tasty nuts; it's great for sharing at special occasions. To finish off, Jasmin prepares some delicious walnut-filled Lebanese Pancakes doused in sweet rose water - yum! Ditch the...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish that's traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. It's a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Luis "Tigretón" Leon cooks up three succulent dishes that are sure to please any garlic lover.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Luis Valenzuela takes us on a culinary tour of the Baja region of Mexico with sweet and savoury flavours from the beach, to the mountains and back again.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Plantain has a sweet reputation, but Venezuelan-born host Juan Pablo Gonzalez shows that banana's cousin also has a savoury side.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple and sophisticated is the best way to describe Chef Luis "Tigretón" Leon's traditional Spanish recipes. He shows us why trout and ham is the new surf and turf.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Chef and seafood lover Spencer Watts makes tastebuds dance as he creates recipes that combine sour and tart flavours with grouper and clams.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Caffeine isn't just to get you going in the morning. Chef Spencer Watts shows how tea and coffee can add a lot of flavour to tuna and mussels.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Get the best of both land and sea as Chef Spencer Watts creates fun surf and turf dishes featuring halibut and lobster.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Seafood enthusiast and Chef Spencer Watts shows how easy and incredibly delicious cooking a whole fish or shellfish can be as he makes snapper and crab.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E17 Chocolate Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Masterful chef-host Katie Ardington loves chocolate, don't we all? Watch as she shares her chocolate handling knowledge and skill in this episode.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E18 Beef Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Beef cookery is precious to Argentinian chef-host Natalia Machado; a world-class chef who combines modern technique with her deep cultural tradition.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E19 Gelatin Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Chef Craig Wong demystifies gelatin, an essential chef's staple ingredient, in this unique and fascinating episode!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E20 Stonefruit Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Chef Derek Dammann loves and loves cooking with all sorts of fruit, but especially stone fruit; including peaches, mangoes, plums, cherries and"... almonds?

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Adopted Tara Broadbent is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her biological ancestry through food.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Martina Castillo learns more about her heritage with the help of Host Tyrone Edwards and expert chefs.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Jamila Doncher was raised in a Filipino household but wants to learn more about her ancestry. She gets the surprise of her life when Host Tyrone Edwards reveals her DNA results.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Kelly Harvey-Mycula is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her ancestry with the help of host Tyrone Edwards.

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Start Here by Sohla El-Waylly! Follow along as Shahir makes a punch-you-in-the-face sauce, beautiful seared scallops, an indulgent chocolate pudding pie for grown-ups, and much more!

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke juicy duck breasts, whip up a Caesar salad, and share the secrets of pizza on the grill!

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, smoke tilapia, whip up veggie quesadillas, and grill a chicken sandwich like you’ve never seen before!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; you'll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple, fun, and magically tasty, some of Vietnam's most delicious and well-known foods come from its capital city of Hanoi. Vietnamese expert Lisa Nguyen shares her knowledge of Hanoi dishes by starting off with a sweet, sour, and spicy papaya salad called Goi Du Du. With a popular nuoc cham dressing featuring sugar, lime juice and Thai chili drizzled over a medley of crunchy carrots, fresh cilantro and mint, chewy papaya, and shrimp, this dish is the perfect balance of wonderful flavours and textures. Also on the menu, grilled-to-perfection Pork Patties with a rich caramel sauce. Fresh fragrant dill and golden turmeric elevate Lisa's next dish as she cooks up some mahi-mahi to enjoy...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: From Fettuccine Alfredo to Meatloaf, everyday recipes are enjoyed every day for a reason: we love them! Chefs Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim use spices to punch up these classic recipes. Meatloaf gets aromatic allspice, and is topped with bay leaf spiked ketchup. Fettuccine gets mustard; both the seed and the leafy green! Bacon and fried rice are ultimate comfort foods, but have you ever tried it with cardamom in the mix? Spice is the secret, a pinch of spice can make a world of difference!

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beans, Raspberry Jam and Relish
programme.desc: On today's Fresh Market Dinners menu, host Amanda Herrera prepares succulent burgers with golden fries and a refreshing cocktail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cream, Sunflower Oil and Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team "drop in" on a group of thrill seeking skydivers at a Skydiving Jamboree. They let the BBQs rip and grill up three different kinds of wings - smoked, jerked and 'suicide hot'. Then they cool things down with an asparagus cucumber salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team put the pedal to the metal at the Go Kart Track. They crank up the heat on the grills and pull out all the stops making Summertime Pizza, Sticky BBQ Chicken, Smoked Turkey Pastrami Sandwiches and a Summer Mellon Ball Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team grill up a feast for some hungry athletes at the Ultimate Frisbee Tournament. Jumbo shrimp with a rosemary dry rub, Slo-smoked Pork Butt in a Papaya Marinade, and Asian Pasta Salad have the athletes asking for more.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Antique Steam train is in town! Matt and the team give the crowd something to chew-chew on with delicious Grilled Vegetable Quesadillas, Honey Mustard Chicken Drumsticks, Grilled Turkey Burgers with Pineapple Salsa, and Grilled Corn with Orange Butter

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team follows him to the baseball diamond and together they treat the ball players to two kinds of mini burgers, some triple play stuffed veal, Mushroom Fricassee on a baguette, and Homerun Mixed Smoked Nuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team lend a hand at a Habitat for Humanity building site to feed hungry volunteers. Matt and the team make some delicious Brick Chicken, some Maple Wood Planked Pork, Steak Sandwiches, and Blue Cheese and Bacon Potato Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Welcome to BBQing 101. The team gives the school term a kick start for some rowdy university students. Smoked Pulled Pork with Tangy BBQ Sauce, Spiced up Beer Can Chicken and Chili Yam Fries give these scholars a taste of simple, healthy BBQed food.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the team do some extreme grilling for the skateboarders at a local park. The crowd flips for Black Bean Mussels, Prosciutto Wrapped Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Goat Cheese, Smoked Tomato Bruschetta and Smoked Banana Sticks with Rum Butter Glaze.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Buskers Festival is in town! The team hit the grill to do some BBQ entertaining. They cook up a feast for the crowd including a Roast of Pork with Concord Grape Sauce, Spicy Shrimp, and Beer Braised Sausage with Caramelized Onions

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill Team go to a neighbourhood Garage Sale, then treat everyone to everyday dishes with a twist. Matt and his team grill up some Grilled Porterhouse Steaks in a Homemade Steak Spice; Grilled Lemon Prosciutto Scallops; Planked Stuffed Potatoes and a Grilled Caesar Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt loves animals - including dogs. He goes to a Dog Show to give dog lovers a little taste of what the QB is cooking - Garlicky Grilled Artichokes; Bacon Wrapped Halibut With Lime Scallion Sauce Sauce; Slow Cooked Spareribs With Guava Glaze; and A Summer Wild Berry Crisp.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team grill up some chow at a bike ride Fundraiser. They tempt the crowd with Hazelnut Crusted Halibut with Strawberry Salsa, Pork Picnic Roast with Blackberry Chipotle Glaze, Grilled Paninis with Roast Veggies, and Spinach Salad with Apples, Bacon and Cashews

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team hit fitness central and cook up a grilled feast that is high on protein and lean on fat including Salt Crusted Peel and Eat Shrimp; Lime Chipotle Pork Medallions; Mesquite Smoked Turkey with Peach Glaze and a Sweet and Spicy Black Bean Salad.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Food Guide Manchester, England
programme.desc: The dining scene in Manchester has changed considerably over the last 20 years. Stuffy fine dining places have been replaced with street food and flavours from across the globe. Joe Remblance explores this cosmopolitan approach that has seeped into Manchester’s culinary scene though European dishes such as Black Pudding and Tzaziki, Asian dishes such as Chicken Curry and innovative dishes such as a fried chicken waffle pizza and deep-fried Cadbury Crème Eggs.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Great World Hotels Le Telfair Heritage, Mauritius
programme.desc: An invigorating body massage, fresh seafood with rum, kayaking - Freishia enjoys finding out the ways in which Mauritius pampers its visitors.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharaja's Express
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharajas' Express Ep 1
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi are on the Maharajas’ Express. Their first destination is Udaipur, where they bump into an old friend who knows all their secrets.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Timeless Tamil Nadu Karaikudi, India
programme.desc: A town defined by medieval grandeur, Karaikudi transports Alex to the era when affluent Chettiar merchants built splendid mansions as a status symbol. At one of these mansions, the secrets of the Chettinad cuisine, heavy on meat and heat, begin to unfold.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Exploring more of Valencia, Alex visits Spain's oldest stadium, a bullfighting ring and Europe's largest marine aquarium, and she learns flamenco.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Great World Hotels Taj Tashi (ENG)
programme.desc: Cradled in the folds of the Himalayas, Bhutan’s geographical isolation has helped to preserve its unique cultural identity.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharaja's Express
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharajas' Express Ep 2
programme.desc: On a trip aboard the Maharajas’ Express, Rohit and Manasi find themselves taking a walk on the wild side.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Spas Evason Ma'in, Jordan
programme.desc: Evason Ma'In, set away from city, nestled amidst palm trees, the sandstone structure looks as thought it has been dyed by the hues of canyon itself.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Timeless Tamil Nadu Rameshwaram, India
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey in Tamil Nadu, Alex visits one of India’s southernmost towns, Rameshwaram. Here, she is treated to stunning views of azure waters and coral islands that stretch all the way to Sri Lanka. What she doesn't expect to find, however, are the ruins of a ghost town sitting on a beach.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: Indonesia's Romantic Getaway
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Indonesia's Romantic Getaway, Labuan Bajo (Eng)
programme.desc: In Labuan Bajo, Sangeeta and Manish embark on a classic adventure aboard a traditional Phinisi, island-hopping through Indonesia’s wild beauty.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Xp Guide Amman, Jordan
programme.desc: Amman, the capital of Jordan sits on a wealth of seven hills, a monotonous sea of white cement structures with the occasional minarets and buildings.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: From hot air balloon rides to visiting cave houses, Kirsty explores the rich geological, cultural and historical heritage of beautiful Cappadocia.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Indonesia's Romantic Getaway
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Indonesia's Romantic Getaway, Borobudur
programme.desc: Amidst ancient temples and misty morning hills, Sangeeta and Manish step into Borobudur’s timeless embrace, where history and serenity intertwine.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Xp Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: With a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, Oslo’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Timeless Tamil Nadu Thanjavur, India
programme.desc: Alex takes a trip to Thanjavur, curious about why it has always been called “the cradle of arts”. Soon, she is lost in the magnificence of the Great Living Chola Temples, with their stunning architecture and intricate carvings, rich in symbolism. At a center for making bronze statues, she is surprised to find out how ancient is the art form. The highlight of her trip, however, is a visit to a workshop for making musical instruments, where she is treated to an impromptu performance.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: In Barcelona, Alex visits San Sebastian beach and Camp Nou stadium, home of FC Barcelona. She also enjoys delectable seafood and heady sangrias.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Food Fact Fun New Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In New Taipei Alex explores the fish, market San Domingo fort, the Gold museum, New Taipei Yingge Ceramics Museum and at last he ends his journey with letting off a sky lantern at Jiufen village.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Xp Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed ships used by the legendary Vikings of Norway.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Timeless Tamil Nadu Nilgiris, India
programme.desc: Ooty has been known to charm visitors ever since British officers used to go there to escape the infamous Indian summer. Sipping tea at the tiered tea plantations, strolling by serene lakes and gushing waterfalls, gawking at gentle deer and majestic elephants at Mudumalai National Park, Alex loses herself in the breathtaking natural beauty of this retreat nestled in the Nilgiri hills.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: After seeing La Sagrada Familia, Gaudi's labour of love, Alex visits La Rambla, the Olympic Stadium and Poble Espanyol, in Barcelona.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Timeless Tamil Nadu Kodaikanal, India
programme.desc: Kodaikanal - the name means “The Gift of the Forest”. True to its name, the cozy hill station nestled in Tamil Nadu’s Palani Hills is captivating with its verdant hills, cascading waterfalls, and postcard-perfect lakes. Alex is truly astonished, however, when she stumbles onto an observatory here that has been tracking solar activity for around 115 years!

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Alex visits an art museum and a vibrant market, dines in the world's oldest restaurant and explores the city on a segway ride, in Madrid.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 City Breaks Bundi, India
programme.desc: From stunning palaces to ornate stepwells, Asmita finds herself soaking in the romance of Bundi, a charming 14th century town in Rajasthan.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Xp Guide Kutna Hora, Czech Republic
programme.desc: The medieval treasury of Czech kings, Kutná Hora owes its prominence to its mines. In fact, the richness of the city’s silver mines was what saw it declared a royal city and made the seat of the Bohemian Royal Mint. As Rohan visits the city’s significant monuments such as a cathedral dedicated to the patron saint of all miners and the erstwhile central mint of the country, he finds out interesting stories about its mining and minting history.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Food Guide Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Salzburg, boasts a culinary scene as sensational as Mozart, the composer who was born here. Chef Joe Remblance enjoys some of its celebrated dishes.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland

programme.desc: Evason Ma'In, set away from city, nestled amidst palm trees, the sandstone structure looks as thought it has been dyed by the hues of canyon itself.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharaja's Express
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharajas' Express Ep 2
programme.desc: On a trip aboard the Maharajas’ Express, Rohit and Manasi find themselves taking a walk on the wild side.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Great World Hotels Taj Tashi (ENG)
programme.desc: Cradled in the folds of the Himalayas, Bhutan’s geographical isolation has helped to preserve its unique cultural identity.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Indonesia's Romantic Getaway
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Indonesia's Romantic Getaway, Borobudur
programme.desc: Amidst ancient temples and misty morning hills, Sangeeta and Manish step into Borobudur’s timeless embrace, where history and serenity intertwine.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: From hot air balloon rides to visiting cave houses, Kirsty explores the rich geological, cultural and historical heritage of beautiful Cappadocia.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Xp Guide Amman, Jordan
programme.desc: Amman, the capital of Jordan sits on a wealth of seven hills, a monotonous sea of white cement structures with the occasional minarets and buildings.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: In Barcelona, Alex visits San Sebastian beach and Camp Nou stadium, home of FC Barcelona. She also enjoys delectable seafood and heady sangrias.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Food Fact Fun New Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In New Taipei Alex explores the fish, market San Domingo fort, the Gold museum, New Taipei Yingge Ceramics Museum and at last he ends his journey with letting off a sky lantern at Jiufen village.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Timeless Tamil Nadu Thanjavur, India
programme.desc: Alex takes a trip to Thanjavur, curious about why it has always been called “the cradle of arts”. Soon, she is lost in the magnificence of the Great Living Chola Temples, with their stunning architecture and intricate carvings, rich in symbolism. At a center for making bronze statues, she is surprised to find out how ancient is the art form. The highlight of her trip, however, is a visit to a workshop for making musical instruments, where she is treated to an impromptu performance.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Xp Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: With a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, Oslo’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: After seeing La Sagrada Familia, Gaudi's labour of love, Alex visits La Rambla, the Olympic Stadium and Poble Espanyol, in Barcelona.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Timeless Tamil Nadu Nilgiris, India
programme.desc: Ooty has been known to charm visitors ever since British officers used to go there to escape the infamous Indian summer. Sipping tea at the tiered tea plantations, strolling by serene lakes and gushing waterfalls, gawking at gentle deer and majestic elephants at Mudumalai National Park, Alex loses herself in the breathtaking natural beauty of this retreat nestled in the Nilgiri hills.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Xp Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed ships used by the legendary Vikings of Norway.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Alex visits an art museum and a vibrant market, dines in the world's oldest restaurant and explores the city on a segway ride, in Madrid.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Food Guide Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Salzburg, boasts a culinary scene as sensational as Mozart, the composer who was born here. Chef Joe Remblance enjoys some of its celebrated dishes.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Timeless Tamil Nadu Kodaikanal, India
programme.desc: Kodaikanal - the name means “The Gift of the Forest”. True to its name, the cozy hill station nestled in Tamil Nadu’s Palani Hills is captivating with its verdant hills, cascading waterfalls, and postcard-perfect lakes. Alex is truly astonished, however, when she stumbles onto an observatory here that has been tracking solar activity for around 115 years!

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Xp Guide Kutna Hora, Czech Republic
programme.desc: The medieval treasury of Czech kings, Kutná Hora owes its prominence to its mines. In fact, the richness of the city’s silver mines was what saw it declared a royal city and made the seat of the Bohemian Royal Mint. As Rohan visits the city’s significant monuments such as a cathedral dedicated to the patron saint of all miners and the erstwhile central mint of the country, he finds out interesting stories about its mining and minting history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 City Breaks Bundi, India
programme.desc: From stunning palaces to ornate stepwells, Asmita finds herself soaking in the romance of Bundi, a charming 14th century town in Rajasthan.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: In Valencia, Alex visits Bioparc, Mercado Central and the former silk exchange. She also tries delectable tapas and local fare.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Food Guide Manchester, England
programme.desc: The dining scene in Manchester has changed considerably over the last 20 years. Stuffy fine dining places have been replaced with street food and flavours from across the globe. Joe Remblance explores this cosmopolitan approach that has seeped into Manchester’s culinary scene though European dishes such as Black Pudding and Tzaziki, Asian dishes such as Chicken Curry and innovative dishes such as a fried chicken waffle pizza and deep-fried Cadbury Crème Eggs.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Timeless Tamil Nadu Madurai, India
programme.desc: During her travels across Tamil Nadu, Alex finally reaches one of India’s most famous pilgrimage sites – Madurai. She pays her respects at the nerve center of the city – the Meenakshi Amman Temple. Her exploration of Madurai reveals to her, however, that there is another, rather delightful side to this revered city.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: The abundant natural and man-made wonders of Norway tell stories of its long and rich history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Lose yourself amidst the spectacular landscapes of Northern Ireland. Witness the miraculous resurfacing of Belfast.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses (ENG)
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharaja's Express
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharajas' Express Ep 1
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi are on the Maharajas’ Express. Their first destination is Udaipur, where they bump into an old friend who knows all their secrets.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Timeless Tamil Nadu Karaikudi, India
programme.desc: A town defined by medieval grandeur, Karaikudi transports Alex to the era when affluent Chettiar merchants built splendid mansions as a status symbol. At one of these mansions, the secrets of the Chettinad cuisine, heavy on meat and heat, begin to unfold.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Exploring more of Valencia, Alex visits Spain's oldest stadium, a bullfighting ring and Europe's largest marine aquarium, and she learns flamenco.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. programme.title: Super Cars

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2

programme.title: WOF 2025 #32: Epic Series - Andorra Epic
programme.desc: The Andorra Epic took place from July 15 to 18, 2025, in the breathtaking Pyrenees. Over four days, riders covered 160 km and 5,000 meters of elevation gain. The event offered world-class mountain biking in the unique atmosphere of Andorra's alpine villages.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 2
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: King of the Court Finals - Doha
programme.desc: From January 5th – 8th, 2022 Doha, Qatar will host the King of the Court Finals at Aspire Zone. The ultimate fight for the crowns will be contested by the combined top-10 teams from Hamburg and Utrecht.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #01 ESP
programme.desc: The 2022 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in ist 15th season in January – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! Right at the beginning a brand-new stop in Baqueira Beret (ESP) awaits the athletes.

programme.title: Engadin Snow 2022
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the longest-running freeride competitions in the Alps. This parallel freeride event in Silvaplana is unique worldwide and combines 20 years of innovation and freeriding.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #02 AND
programme.desc: Following the inaugural event at Baqueira Beret (ESP) last weekend, the Freeride World Tour returns to the perennial Pyrenean freeride mecca of Ordino Arcalís, Andorra!

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge returns to the heart of Innsbruck, Austria for its big 20th anniversary!On May 18th, the world’s best Long Jumpers and Pole Vaulters will compete for important world ranking points in order to qualify for the Olympic Games in Paris!

programme.title: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 3
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #04
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #05
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Rhythm of the Ocean
programme.desc: A captivating documentary that ventures beyond the waves, exploring the profound relationship between surfers and their environment. Through stunning visuals and personal anecdotes, the film paints a vivid portrait of the surfing lifestyle.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap UpIn This weeks episode we take a look at the season wrap up of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Let´s check out Europes best wavesailors, competing at the bests spots on the Contoinent

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #03 CAN
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Jackson Hole, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions.

programme.title: Salomon Golden Trails - Series
programme.desc: Welcome to this week´s episode of World of Freesports. Today we travel to the Canary Islands – to El Hiero, Spain. We will be witnessing one of the hardest and most iconic trail running events in Europe – the Salomon Golden Trail.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2022
programme.desc: 8Oropesa del Mar – Castellón (ESP), February 10th to 13th 2022It is the first big clash of the mountain bike season: a UCI Hors Catégorie 4-day stage race. The race offers spectacular mountain bike trails in close proximity to the sea!

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Bouldern & Climbing 2013
programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsportsteam 2015 - Mountainsports: Climbing & Unicycling
programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Bürser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Go Big or Go Home - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: Go big or go home - in search of the perfect waveadidas Outdoorsportsteam: Nick Troutman, Mat Dumoulin, Gerd Serrasolses & Peter CsonkaNo distance is too great for these four athletes - their quest takes them and their kayaks from Africa to North America.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 1
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 2
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: VANORA Engadinwind by DAKINE - Racing
